text: Marvin Mandel (April 19, 1920 - August 30, 2015) was an American politician. He was the 56th Governor of Maryland. He was a member of the Democratic Party. He was governor from 1969 to 1979. Mandel was born in Baltimore, Maryland. ==References== ==Other websites== * Maryland Manual official state gubernatorial biography * Law Firm: Mandel, Liff & Walsh, LLP Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Governors of Maryland Category:Jewish American politicians Category:Politicians from Baltimore Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Marvin Mandel
